https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pokVN75BphBp6ZKaDfzSqmkvO7X.jpg Chieri is a sixth grade girl whose only friend is a stuffed toy named Cherry, which she found while hiding in the cellar during her father's funeral. Chieri and Cherry undertake a journey on the border between fantasy and reality. Chieri and Cherry
